Attack.Description:
•Standard attacks vary by weapon and spell. See your attacks for information.
•You can choose to replace your Muscle mod with a -2 Finesse mod
•If the weapon has a Balance tag, you can ignore the -2 penalty to your Finesse mod

Disarm.Description:
•Grab an object held by a target and attempt to pull it away. Make a Disarm contest against the target’s +8 Muscle Check.  On a success, the target is disarmed of the item. 
•Attempting to Disarm a weapon gives the target an opportunity attack against you on a fail.
•Each Debuff status affecting the target’s arm gives them an additional -3 toward the check.

Throw.Description:
•Make a Throw check on a held object against a target within range. On a hit, the target takes 1 damage or status according to the GM's discretion. 
•You can choose to replace your Muscle mod with a -2 Finesse mod
•If the object is Weight and < Size 1 you can ignore the -2 penalty to your Finesse mod

Choke.Description: •Make a Choke check contested against the target’s Muscle check. On a success the target takes a stage of Suffocating

Grapple.Description: •Make a Grapple check contested against the target’s Muscle check. On a success the target takes a stage of Restrained

Strike.Description: •Make a Strike check against a target’s choice of reaction. On a hit, the target takes a stage of Stunned for every 2 hits they have taken during your turn (Attack, special move, or another Strike).

Shove.Description: •Make a Shove check contested against the target’s Muscle check. On a success the target takes a stage of Prone

Tackle.Description: •Make a Tackle check contested against the target’s Muscle check. On a success the target takes a stage of Prone and Grappled. You also take a stage of Prone

Leap.Description:
•Declare a distance you want to Leap. Make a Leap check and add your Momentum stages if applicable. 
•Your horizontal range = (Leap check/5) + Momentum Stage 
•Your vertical range =  (Leap check/10) + Momentum Stage
•If the declared distance is less than the range, you must succeed in a Coordination Check or take a stage of Prone 
•DC = Range * 5
•You can choose to replace your Jump mod with a -2 Coordination mod

Lunge.Description:
•Make a Lunge check to gain stages of Momentum.
•Momentum stage = Lunge check / 10

Climb.Description:
•Make a Climb check to scale up a surface or creature. 
•DC = 5 + (2 * Total climbing range)
•On a fail, you fall from your height and suffer any applicable effects.

Acrobatics.Description:
•Roll Acrobatics to avoid an obstacle or maintain balance
•You can choose to replace your Coordination mod with a -2 Muscle mod
•You can ignore the -2 penalty to your Muscle mod at the GM’s discretion

Dive.Description:
•Trigger - An Attack is declared against you or you are in the Area of Effect of an Attack or Special Move.
*Dive automatically fails if Attacks or Special Moves targeting you fill the Area of Effect you are in and you are not within Jumping range of the border of that Attack’s Area of Effect IE: Earthquake
Effect:
•Move up to the Range away to gain a +10 on a Dodge Check but land Prone 
•Prone stage = 0 to 8 Stage 3; 9 to 14 stage 2; 15+ Stage 1

Dodge.Description:
•Trigger - An Attack is declared against you or you are in the Area of Effect of an Attack or Special Move.
*Dodge automatically fails if Attacks or Special Moves targeting you fill the Area of Effect you are in and you are not on the border of that Attack’s Area of Effect IE: Earthquake
Effect:
•Roll 1d6 and add your Dodge bonus (base + armor) to contest the Attack or evade the effect. On success, you take no damage.

Parry.Description:
•Trigger - You are selected for the target of a physical or weapon attack
Effect:
•Meet an enemies attack with your own. Make a melee Attack roll contest against an incoming physical Attack. The winner of the contest deals damage to the loser if within range. If outside range, the loser’s attack counted as miss
•You can choose to replace your Finesse mod with a -2 Muscle mod

Steal.Description:
•An attempt to take an equipped weapon or item from an equipment slot of the Target (not from a hand). Make a Steal contest against the target’s +8 Perception check. On a success, you take the item, on a fail the target is given a free opportunity attack against you
•Each stage of the Concealed status you have against the target gives you an additional +3 toward the Steal check

Trip.Description:
•Trigger - A target moves through a space adjacent to you
Effect:
•Make a Trip check contested against a target’s +3 Coordination check. On a success the target takes a stage of Prone 
•Prone stage = Contest difference/5 rounded down
•Each Momentum stage -3 from the target’s Coordination check

Hide.Description: •Attempt to hide away from view. Make a Hide check. DC determined by the GM. On a success, you gain 1 stage of Hidden

Defend.Description:
•Trigger - An Attack or special move is declared against you or you are in the Area of Effect of an Attack or special move.
Effect:
•Roll 1d6 and add your Defend bonus (base + armor) to contest the Attack or evade the effect. On success, you take no damage

Guard Vitals.Description:
•Trigger - An Attack or special move is declared against a target's Vitals
Effect:
•Vital 1 - Roll 2d6 and add your Defend OR Dodge armor bonus to contest the Attack or evade the effect. On success, you take no damage
•Vital 2 - Roll 3d6 and add your Defend OR Dodge armor bonus to contest the Attack or evade the effect. On success, you take no damage
•Vital 1 - Roll 4d6 and add your Defend OR Dodge armor bonus to contest the Attack or evade the effect. On success, you take no damage

Brace.Description:
•Roll a Brace check to give yourself an additional d6's to use on reactions until the start of your next turn. 
•Number of d6's = the Brace check /5 (rounded down)

Charge Power.Description:
•Roll a Charge Power check to gain momentum towards your next Power Rank 
•DC = 10 + Power Rank

Concentrate.Description: •Maintain Concentration on the spell or effect. DC = 8 + power rank of spell + number of turns concentrated.

Focus.Description:
•Focus can be applied before any action to raise the minimum roll value. 
•Roll a Focus check and divide it in half to make a focus value. On your following action, any dice roll below this focus value will be treated as the focus value instead of the dice value (except for Crit fails).

Recover.Description: •Roll a Recover Check to regain a damaged health block or mental status. DC = 8 + 1 per Debuff status currently affecting you AND Missing Health Block

Enemy History.Description: •Tap knowledge of any historical record or mentions of this specific group. DC is determined by the GM

Arcana.Description: •Tap knowledge of what magic is being used and what effects it has. DC is determined by the GM

Tactics.Description: •Roll a Tactics check to tap knowledge of any specific tactics used by the enemy's Stat Block. DC is determined by the GM

Battlefield.Description: •Tap knowledge of any advantages or weaknesses presented on the battlefield. DC is determined by the GM

Evaluate Enemy.Description: •Try to read an enemies motives strengths and difficulty. DC is Determined by the GM

Coordinated Attack.Description:
•Roll a Coordinated Attack check to invite an ally within range to perform actions (with you) in succession. 
•You and your ally spend their 12 AP for the round to share a single turn and with a total combined AP for both of you equal to your Coordinated Attack check
•You are limited to movement and one action each.

Improvise.Description: •Find a branch for a quick weapon, kick dirt to put out a fire, or use your ingenuity to solve a quick problem. DC set by GM.

Bandage.Description: •Aid an ally by Healing a Health Block or 1 status (if applicable). DC determined by Status or GM

Aim.Description: •Roll an Aim check to improve the accuracy of your next attack (action or special move) against a single target you can see. Add your Aim Check total divided by 4 to your following attack roll.

Find Vitals.Description: •Roll a Find Vitals to determine an enemies Vital points. The vital stage you learn is equal to your Find Vitals check divided by 10

Taunt.Description: •Roll a Taunt check against a target to inflict the Captivated Frightened, or Frenzied status to a target. DC determined by GM

Distract.Description: •Roll a Distract check against a target to give a target a level of Flanked. DC determined by GM

Feint.Description: •Roll a Feint contest against a target’s Evaluate Enemy check. On a success you deceive a target of your intended attack, and they must roll their intended reaction to the attack. The target cannot use the same reaction against your next attack

Pacify.Description: •Roll a Pacify check against a target's Diplomatic check to try and convince a them to withdraw from combat. On a success, initiative is paused.

Encourage.Description: •Roll an Encourage check against a target to give an ally one stage of the Bolstered status. DC determined by GM
